Reviews.Title: Perfect Bundle for starters!
Reviews.Author: aliakbar
Reviews.Content: Everything you need for starting professional photography!The camera is great, but the accessories attached with it makes it perfect!

Reviews.Title: love my camera but hard to focus
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: I love the camera but is unlike my old rebel that was very easy to partially press the shutter and it would focus very quickly this one you have to hold it down sometimes it takes a picture before focusing. the shipping was fast and very well packed good value for the money
